column4: my computer started making cuckoo noises last night, and it's been doing it every half hour since...does anyone know why this might be happening?
through the speakers? or from the box
are you using kde? or gnome
check dr_willis 's post to you .. that's probably where the answer lies.
dr_willis only thing I changed was I installed qcad...but I can't imagine that being the cause
does it happen when you do something specific like open or close a window, maybe click something that doesn't do anything at that time?  Almost sounds like systems sounds.
it happens every half hour on the half hour...I'm guessing it's tied to the clock
sounds like you need to check cron jobs, clock settings etc.. should be listed in your processes list .. maybe :P
9.04 recognizes both my pata and sata drives as hd<something>
really?  hardy and intrepid were all sd<something>
i don't know if it matters, but it's currently just a live cd running and the two sata drives are laptop sata drives
might be.. I don't think they've changed the sub system that drasticly again.
you can mount them to differently named locations
so say hdc1 you can mount it to /media/hdc3 if you want or change the name to /media/data
so you're going to put this windows drive in the machine..?? should work.. and yes.. windows can see linux shares and vice versa
